selected_quotes: Radio drama was thought to be dying – then podcasts came along
Digital technology has given an old format a new lease of life.
Radio drama was thought to be dying. then came podcasts #serial
A world in your ears – radio's dramatic rebirth in the digital age #podcasting #Audio (h/t M. Pate…
A world in your ears- radio's dramatic rebirth in the digital age - my piece for #audiodramasund…

news.title: Prepare for a new golden age of audio drama as big names flock to podcasting
news.summary: News that Amazon’s audiobook arm, Audible, is investing US$5m (£3.8m) to seek out writing talent for forthcoming new releases, is further evidence of a major revival in the medium.

news.title: How podcasting is having a major revival with new audio productions of The X-Files and Doctor Who
news.summary: Well-produced podcast drama can also often act as a pilot of future productions - 'Limetown' and 'Homecoming' have both received interest from TV companies News that Amazon’s audiobook arm, Audible, is investing US$5m (£3.8m) to seek out writing…
